728887f-b.text:
Great Eills Road, adjoining the N.E. corner of Mansion Avenue, showing the old Seguine House. Butler's 1853 map, Beers's 1874 map, and Robinson's maps of 1898 and 1907 show the house to have belonged to the family of J.G. Seguine. P.L. Sperr states that the house later became known as the Britton House. The view is north from the Great Eills Shore.
March 24, 1919
By Wm. T. Davis through P.L. Sperr
(2)
Looking south from near Hylan Boulevard.
May 14, 1932.
P.L. Sperr
(3)
A view of the approach to the north side of the house.
May 14, 1932.
P.L. Sperr
728887f-b.folder: Great Kills Road & Mansion Avenue, Staten Island, NY
